import React, { useState } from 'react' import MobileMenu from './MobileMenu' import styles from './NavBar.module.css' function NavBar() { let [openNav, setOpenNav] = useState(false) let [isClosed , setIsClosed] = useState(false) let openMobileNav = () => { setOpenNav(true) } let closeMobileMenu = () => { setOpenNav(false) setIsClosed(true) } return (
